children.description: content to render inside Container - extended from [Container component](../../molecules/Container/props.md#children)
children.comment: content to render inside Container - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/molecules/Container Container}

wrapper.comment: component wrapper type - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/molecules/Container Container}

expanded.description: Extra content displayed only when container is expanded (`compact` === `true`)

compact.description: if true, shows the whole container content

onChange.description: Callback triggered when ExpandableContainer component input value is changed by the user
